ordersText.title: DREAD JUDGEMENT
ordersText.general: During the resolution step of the combat that was started while resolving this order, you may force your opponent to choose 1 of his routed units and destroy it. *newline* LIMIT ONCE PER ROUND.

ordersText.title: PURGING BANNERS
ordersText.general: When you reveal this order token, rally all of your units in the active system. *newline* LIMIT ONCE PER ROUND.

ordersText.title: SIGILS OF REVELATION
ordersText.general: When you reveal this order token, you may look at all order tokens of any stack. *newline* LIMIT ONCE PER ROUND.

ordersText.title: TERROR STRIKE
ordersText.general: Enemy bastions do not prevent this orbital strike. During this orbital strike consider the your ships as the attacker. You may spend 2 [S] to force your opponent to choose and retreat 1 of his units. *newline* LIMIT ONCE PER ROUND.

ordersText.title: INEVITABLE EXCAVATION
ordersText.general: During this orbital strike, gain 1 [D], and you may spend 1 [M] to gain an asset token from this world. *newline* LIMIT ONCE PER ROUND.

eventsText.title: TRIUMPHAL WITHDRAW
eventsText.general: Place this card in your play area and discard all of your other schemes. *newpara* After you resolve an Advance Order, you may discard this card to collect an Inquisition objective token that is on a friendly world in the active system.

eventsText.title: PSIONIC WARFARE
eventsText.general: Place this card in your play area and discard all of your other schemes. *newpara* When you reveal an order during Operations phase, you may discard this card, to choose your opponent's order upgrade and turn it face down, making it unusable this round.

eventsText.title: CUTTHROATS FOR HIRE
eventsText.general: Place this card in your play area and discard all of your other schemes. *newpara* At the end of reinforce step of combat, you may discard this card to force your opponent to choose and either rout 1 of his units if you are attacking or to retreat 1 of his units if you are defending.

eventsText.title: RADICALS AND PURITANS
eventsText.general: Either purchase 1 structure in any system and reducing its materiel cost by 1 or destroy 1 of your structures in any system to gain that structure's materiel cost increased by 1.

eventsText.title: ELYSIAN DROP TROOPS
eventsText.general: Either place 1 free Stormtrooper on an uncontrolled world in a system containing at least 1 of your ships or place 1 free Stormtrooper on any friendly world.

eventsText.title: MINISTORUM'S DOGMA
eventsText.general: Purchase 1 combat upgrade, reducing its materiel cost by 1 for each system with no enemy units.

eventsText.title: TOTAL AUTHORITY
eventsText.general: Place this card in your play area and discard all of your other schemes. *newpara* During the first turn of the Planning Phase, you may distard this card to place an additional order token this turn. During this Planning Phase you will place five order tokens.

combatText.title: BLINDING SALVO
combatText.general: If you are attacking, your opponent cannot resolve the general ability of his next revealed combat card. *newpara*  If you are defending, gain 1 [D].

combatText.title: SHADOW ASSIGNMENT
combatText.unit: Stormtrooper/Rogue Trader: If you have more [M] than your opponent, force your opponent to either choose and rout 1 of his units or to spend a die of your choice.

combatText.title: PSYKER SHIELD
combatText.unit: Deathwatch/Rogue Trader: Spend 2 (S) to place 1 free reinforcement token in this area.

combatText.title: UNQUESTIONABLE WISDOM
combatText.unit: Stormtrooper/Rogue Trader: Play 1 combat card from your hand. Do not resolve it's abilities, but gain it's combat icons until the end of this execution round.

combatText.title: FRENZON IMPLANTS
combatText.unit: Stormtrooper/Rogue Trader: Spend 2 (B) to convert all of your [M] into [B].

combatText.title: SANCTIONED PSYKER
combatText.general: Your opponent may spend 1 [B] to gain 1 (B). If he does not, force your opponent to lose 1 [S].
combatText.unit: Stormtrooper/Rogue Trader: If your opponent has any (B), gain 2 (S). Otherwise gain 1 [B].

combatText.title: UNFLINCHING CRUSADERS
combatText.unit: Deathwatch/Rogue Trader: If you are defending, rally 1 of your units. *newpara* Gain 2 (S) unless your opponent spends 1 [S].

combatText.title: RELENTLESS ASSAULT
combatText.general: Either gain 2 (S) or force your opponent to lose 1 [M].
combatText.unit: Deathwatch/Rogue Trader: If you are attacking, rally 1 of your units. *newpara* Spend 1 [S] to gain 2 (B).

combatText.title: FAITH GUIDANCE
combatText.general: If you are attacking, your opponent cannot resolve the unit ability of his next revealed combat card. *newpara* If you are defending, either gain 1 | or retreat 1 of your units.

combatText.title: LIDLESS STARE
combatText.general: Force your opponent to reroll 2 dice. For each rolled [B], gain 1 (B) and 1 (S), for each [S] rolled, 1 (B).
combatText.unit: Deathwatch/Black Ship: Force your opponent to lose either 1 [B] or 1 [S] unless he chooses and routs 1 of his units.

combatText.title: DEFENSIVE BARRAGE
combatText.general: Reroll either 1 [B] or 1 [M] to force your opponent to lose 1 [B].
combatText.unit: Valkyrie: Take 1 Stormtrooper from any world and place it on this world. *newpara* Black Ship: Take 1 Stormtrooper and place it on friendly or uncontrolled world in this system.

combatText.title: HELLSTRIKE MISSILES
combatText.general: Reroll either 1 [S] or 1 [M] to force your opponent to lose 1 [S].
combatText.unit: Valkyrie/Black Ship: Destroy 1 of your opponent's routed units.

combatText.title: TRUESILVER ARMOUR
combatText.unit: Grey Knight/Black Ship: During this combat, health value of your units is increased by 1.

combatText.title: TELEPORT STRIKE
combatText.general: Choose 1 of your opponent's units. That unit  suffer damage first during this execution round.
combatText.unit: Grey Knight/Black Ship: During this execution round, if your opponent has to assign any damage, he assigns 3 additional damage.
